import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared/services/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.scss'] }) export class InicioComponent { citaPedida: number = -1; constructor(private sharedService: SharedService) {} ngOnInit() { this.sharedService.citaPedida.subscribe(resp => { this.citaPedida = resp; console.log(this.citaPedida); }); } }
